attributes.title: 2012 TATA Indica Vista 1.4 Ignis

attributes.description:
the car was ahead of its time even then ! Front wheel drive,  the car could sit low due to its unitary monocoque body, setting it out amongst its contemporary rivals . Independent suspension. This resulted in a much lighter car than competitors. This example is one of the very last in a production spell of over 20 years !! They are enigmatic, romantic, and stereotypically classic.
This is the British built version known as the 11C.  Great alternative classic . Come and have a look........ ooh la la !!
